医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
科学家发现抗击疟疾的新型抗体美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 研究人员今天在《科学》杂志上发表的一项研究表明，一类新型抗体可以与疟疾寄生虫中以前未靶向的部分结合，从而可能带来新的预防方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Scientists-identify-novel-antibodies-for-fighting-malaria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Scientists-identify-novel-antibodies-for-fighting-malaria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4dbaf026-16f9-4081-b2cd-d141b4e3601f Fri, 03 Jan 2025 11:16:21 -0500 Scientists identify novel antibodies for fighting malaria
解决为患有阿尔茨海默病和相关痴呆症的阿尔茨海默病患者提供医疗服务的障碍Kosali Simon，博士、文学硕士，保罗 H. 奥尼尔公共与环境事务学院教授，​​Regenstrief 研究所研究科学家；芝加哥大学教务长 Katherine Baicker 博士将共同领导一项预计耗资近 1600 万美元的美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 国家老龄化研究所 (NIA) 项目，该项目旨在探索为阿尔茨海默病及相关疾病患者提供医疗保健服务的关键方面痴呆症（ADRD）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Addressing-barriers-to-healthcare-delivery-for-people-with-Alzheimers-with-Alzheimers-disease-and-lated-dementias.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Addressing-barriers-to-healthcare-delivery-for-people-with-Alzheimers-with-Alzheimers-disease-and-lated-dementias.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd02cb18-f760-4471-88d8-a5719c3b6941 Fri, 03 Jan 2025 11:12:27 -0500 Addressing barriers to healthcare delivery for people with Alzheimer's with Alzheimer's disease and related dementias
门多塔湖中的细菌随着季节变化而循环进化就像电影《土拨鼠之日》中的比尔·默里一样，威斯康星州湖中的细菌种类处于一种似乎无法动摇的无限循环之中。除了这个例子，它更像是土拨鼠年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Bacteria-in-Lake-Mendota-evolve-in-cycles-following-seasonal-shifts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Bacteria-in-Lake-Mendota-evolve-in-cycles-following-seasonal-shifts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8c6e8a3-af44-4770-aca2-cead23c27441 Fri, 03 Jan 2025 10:59:47 -0500 Bacteria in Lake Mendota evolve in cycles following seasonal shifts
水稻研究人员开发出用于工程智能细胞的新型构建套件莱斯大学的生物工程师开发了一种新的构建套件，用于在人体细胞中构建定制的感知和响应电路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Rice-researchers-develop-new-construction-kit-for-engineering-smart-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Rice-researchers-develop-new-construction-kit-for-engineering-smart-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b63772ba-4bb2-4b94-b8c8-0f573f3c5df7 Fri, 03 Jan 2025 09:44:22 -0500 Rice researchers develop new construction kit for engineering smart cells
Clue 首席执行官 Rhiannon White 谈 Femtech 和 PCOS 的未来在 Rhiannon White 的领导下，Clue 正在将月经健康追踪转变为研究和改善生殖健康结果的强大工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Clues-CEO-Rhiannon-White-on-the-Future-of-Femtech-and-PCOS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Clues-CEO-Rhiannon-White-on-the-Future-of-Femtech-and-PCOS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f3e5679-1781-4d84-9fd9-73330211dd9d Fri, 03 Jan 2025 09:06:00 -0500 Clue's CEO Rhiannon White on the Future of Femtech and PCOS
巴西的现金转移计划减少了弱势群体的结核病病例和死亡人数巴西的家庭补助计划 (BFP) 是世界上最大的有条件现金转移计划之一，该计划使生活在极端贫困和原住民群体中的结核病病例和死亡人数减少了一半以上，一项由巴西政府协调的大型研究显示。巴塞罗那全球健康研究所 (ISGlobal)，该中心由“la Caixa”基金会、集体健康研究所和巴西巴伊亚的 CIDACS-FIOCRUZ 支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Brazils-cash-transfer-program-cuts-tuberculosis-cases-and-deaths-among-vulnerable-populations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Brazils-cash-transfer-program-cuts-tuberculosis-cases-and-deaths-among-vulnerable-populations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=248151b6-3541-479c-9ed9-ab2c5fef1df9 Fri, 03 Jan 2025 07:26:49 -0500 Brazil's cash transfer program cuts tuberculosis cases and deaths among vulnerable populations
研究人员从血液中培养肿瘤类器官以应对乳腺癌转移血液中循环的肿瘤细胞是乳腺癌转移的“生殖细胞”。它们非常罕见，直到现在还无法在培养皿中繁殖，这使得治疗耐药性的研究变得困难。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Researchers-grow-tumor-organoids-from-blood-to-tackle-breast-cancer-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Researchers-grow-tumor-organoids-from-blood-to-tackle-breast-cancer-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09e4ea64-3046-4591-93fc-78443f5c4618 Fri, 03 Jan 2025 07:09:06 -0500 Researchers grow tumor organoids from blood to tackle breast cancer metastasis
社交关系可以增强免疫力并降低疾病风险新研究表明，与朋友和家人的互动可以让我们保持健康，因为它们可以增强我们的免疫系统，降低患心脏病、中风和 2 型糖尿病等疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Social-connections-may-boost-immunity-and-reduce-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Social-connections-may-boost-immunity-and-reduce-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d75ef666-0bff-4f13-bb6c-ec755bd1ec72 Fri, 03 Jan 2025 06:53:04 -0500 Social connections may boost immunity and reduce disease risk
食管癌基因突变被发现具有双重影响根据发表在《自然癌症》杂志上的新研究，长期以来人们认为导致食管癌发展的遗传缺陷实际上可能在疾病早期发挥保护作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Genetic-mutation-in-esophageal-cancer-found-to-have-dual-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Genetic-mutation-in-esophageal-cancer-found-to-have-dual-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b105bd1f-3be1-420d-9d7c-334c9dfbc6d6 Fri, 03 Jan 2025 06:36:13 -0500 Genetic mutation in esophageal cancer found to have dual effects
兴奋剂使用者陷入阿片类药物流行的致命“第四波”在罗德岛州波塔基特，靠近一家广告“免费”手机的店面，JR 坐在空荡荡的后楼梯间里，向记者展示了他在吸食强效可卡因时如何避免吸食过量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Stimulant-users-are-caught-in-fatal-e28098fourth-wavee28099-of-opioid-epidemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Stimulant-users-are-caught-in-fatal-e28098fourth-wavee28099-of-opioid-epidemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a0dffbf-3f49-451d-933c-08bf859435e7 Fri, 03 Jan 2025 05:35:55 -0500 Stimulant users are caught in fatal ‘fourth wave’ of opioid epidemic
